MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK11 postcode area  of Menstrie affecting properties in Abercrombie Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:32pm. Our emergency response team is onsite but having difficulties during the replacement of an electricity pole. We will look to have the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:25pm on the 3rd November.
